Package Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The game class manages the game flow. It determines player queue, sends messages to right players, checks if move is correct, updates the game board

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(List<Player> players, int boardSize)
      Constructor Sets all necessary variables, sends board and other info to players at the start of the game
      Parameters:
      players - list of players who play this game
      boardSize - selected size of a game board

  • Method Details

    • getInitializationData

      public String getInitializationData​(int playerID)
      Creates all necessary data that needs to be delivered to player when starting the game
      Parameters:
      playerID - id of player we are sending the data
      Returns:
      all the data in form of a String

    • showPossibilities

      public void showPossibilities​(int startMoveField, int playerId)
      Method being used after player first click, based on the field he/she selected it maps available fields in game rules and sends them to player.
      Parameters:
      startMoveField - the field selected on first click
      playerId - id of a player who is trying to move

    • move

      public void move​(int startMoveField, int endMoveField, int playerId)
      Method being used after player second click, based on the field he/she selected, it checks if the move is legal and if someone won. After move sends updated board to all players
      Parameters:
      startMoveField - the field selected on first click
      endMoveField - the field selected on second click
      playerId - id of a player who is trying to move

    • playerStillPlaying

      public boolean playerStillPlaying​(int playerId)
      Checks if given player is still playing the game
      Parameters:
      playerId - player we are checking
      Returns:
      true if player is still in the game

    • resetFieldsStatus

      public void resetFieldsStatus()
      Resets all board fields status (Sets it to inactive)

    • sendToPlayers

      public void sendToPlayers​(String message)
      Sends the message to all players
      Parameters:
      message - message we want to send

    • sendToPlayer

      public void sendToPlayer​(int id, String message)
      Sends message only to given player
      Parameters:
      id - player id
      message - message we want to send

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns:
      returns this game board

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(int id)
      Sets id of current player to id of given player
      Parameters:
      id - given player id

    • getRules

      public TrylmaRules getRules()
      Returns:
      returns ruleset of this game
